text: Juna dina usale timi sabaila'i ekatrita hune dina ekatrita garnecha, tyo hara ra jitako dina hunecha ra jasale allahamathi imana lya'e ra asala karma gare, usale unibata unaka naramra kuraharu hata'idinecha ra unala'i svargako bagaharuma jasamuni naharaharu bagirakheka chan, pravista gara'unecha, tiniharu sadhaim tyasama rahanechan. Yo thulo saphalata ho
